live_updates: This issue is now resolved.  Thank you for your patience.

28195.summary: Some customers in Edmonton (Belmead) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
28195.title: Oct 28 - Edmonton  (Belmead) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
